blueprint.description:
A station where a solid commodity is loaded onto trains.
Only enabled when there is a full load ready.
blueprint.label: Supply Station

blueprint.description:
Demand station + prioritization signalling.
This station will activate when it can receive a full load.
It's priority is determined by how many loads it can receive.
blueprint.label: Demand+ Station

blueprint.description: A train dedicated to a specific item commodity type.
blueprint.label: Dedicated Item Train

blueprint.description: A flexible train for any item commodity types.
blueprint.label: Flex Item Train

blueprint.description: Parking spot for inactive trains, like a shared stacker.
blueprint.label: Depot Station

blueprint.description:
A station where fluids are loaded onto trains.
Only enabled when there is a full load ready.
blueprint.label: Fluid Supply Station

blueprint.description:
Fluid Demand Station with Priority
Will trigger demand at half of a full load since the station keeps so little on hand.
blueprint.label: Fluid Demand+

blueprint.description: A train dedicated to a specific fluid commodity type.
blueprint.label: Dedicated Fluid Train

blueprint_book.label: IVTN v2.0.2a
blueprint_book.description: A vanilla train network featuring a central depot instead of needing stackers, also allows priority demand stations.
